text.0: i laud your mighty one who joyeth in the juice him who is shared by all men who created all.
text.1: indra whose conquering strength is powerful in war whose fame and manly vigour heaven and earth revere.
text.2: he with his friend is active lauded good to man indra who must be glorified by one like me.
text.3: hero lord of the brave all cars are thy delight warring with vṛtra or for waters or for spoil.
text.4: who are the men whom thou wilt further indra who strive to win thy bliss allied with riches.
text.5: who urged thee forward to exert thy power divine to valour in the war for waters on their fields.
text.6: thou indra through the holy prayer art mighty worthy of sacrifice at all libations.
text.7: in every fight thou castest heroes on the ground thou art the noblest song o lord of all the folk.
text.8: help now as highest those who toil at sacrifice well do the people know thy great protecting might.
text.9: thou shalt be everlasing giver of success yea on all these libations thou bestowest strength.
text.10: all these libations thou makest effectual of which thou art thyself supporter son of power.
text.11: therefore thy vessel is to be esteemed the best sacrifice holy text prayer and exalted speech.
text.12: they who with flowing soma pray to thee o sage to pour on them thy gifts of opulence and wealth.
text.13: may they come forward through their spirit on the path of bliss in the wild joy of soma juice effused.
